      communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR
      240.14d-2(b))</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="90%">

          <tr>
            <td align="justify" valign="top" width="7%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><strong>Item
                1.01</strong></font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><strong>Entry
                into a Material Definitive
                Agreement.</strong></font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">On
      November 15, 2007, Kraft Foods Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) announced that it had
      entered into a &#8220;Reverse-Morris Trust&#8221; transaction agreement (the &#8220;RMT
      Transaction Agreement&#8221;) dated as of November 15, 2007 among the Company; Cable
      Holdco, Inc. (&#8220;Splitco&#8221;), a Delaware corporation and an indirect, wholly-owned
      subsidiary of the Company; Ralcorp Holdings, Inc. (&#8220;Ralcorp&#8221;), a Missouri
      corporation; and Ralcorp Mailman LLC (&#8220;Merger Sub&#8221;), a Delaware limited
      liability company and a direct, wholly-owned subsidiary of Ralcorp, pursuant
      to
      which the <em>Post</em> cereals business (the &#8220;Business&#8221;) of the Company will be
      combined with Ralcorp in a tax efficient transaction.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Pursuant
      to the RMT Transaction Agreement, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company,
      Kraft Foods Global, Inc. (&#8220;Kraft Global&#8221;), will incur $300 million in debt (the
&#8220;RMT Debt&#8221;) under a credit facility on the terms and conditions set forth in a
      commitment letter entered into with certain financial
      institutions.&#160;&#160;Kraft Global will retain the proceeds of the RMT
      Debt.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Pursuant
      to the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">&#8220;Contribution<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">&#8221;</font>
      described in the
</font>RMT Transaction Agreement, (i) the Company will transfer or cause to
      be
      transferred to Cable Newco, LLC (&#8220;Newco&#8221;), a Delaware limited liability company
      and a direct, wholly-owned subsidiary of Kraft Global, the U.S. assets
      of&#160;the Business and Newco will assume the U.S. liabilities of the Business
      and&#160;(ii) the&#160;limited liability company interests in&#160;Newco will be
      contributed to Splitco.&#160;&#160;As consideration in the Contribution, Splitco
      will assume the RMT Debt obligations and will issue to Kraft Global (x)
      approximately $662 million in debt securities (the &#8220;Splitco Securities&#8221;) having
      terms determined pursuant to the RMT Transaction Agreement (or, under certain
      circumstances described in the RMT Transaction Agreement, a demand note will
      be
      issued instead of the Splitco Securities) and (y) a number of shares of Splitco
      common stock determined in accordance with a formula set forth in the RMT
      Transaction Agreement.&#160; In addition, immediately after the short form
      merger (described below), the Company will transfer or cause to be transferred
      the Canadian and any other non-U.S. assets to Canadian or other non-U.S.
      subsidiaries of Ralcorp and those subsidiaries will assume the applicable
      non-U.S. liabilities.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Kraft
      Global (i) will distribute all the issued and outstanding shares of
      Splitco&#160;common stock held by Kraft Global to the Company, (ii) will
      transfer the RMT Debt proceeds to the Company in retirement of outstanding
      intercompany debt and (iii) may transfer the Splitco Securities to the Company
      in retirement of outstanding intercompany debt.&#160; The Company will use the
      proceeds of the RMT Debt and the Splitco Securities to repay debt obligations
      of
      the Company.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">&#160;Pursuant
      to the RMT Transaction Agreement, the Company will distribute the shares of
      Splitco common stock to its shareholders (and possibly to a limited
      number&#160;of holders of Company deferred stock awards).&#160;&#160;At the
      Company&#8217;s election, it may distribute the Splitco common stock by means of a pro
      rata dividend in a spin-off or&#160;pursuant to an exchange offer in a
      split-off, or a combination of a spin-off and a split-off (the
&#8220;Distribution&#8221;).&#160; The Company has not yet made a decision as to the form of
      the Distribution.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Immediately
      after the Distribution, Splitco will merge with and into Merger Sub (the
&#8220;Merger&#8221;), whereby each issued share of Splitco common stock will be converted
      into the right to receive one fully paid and nonassessable share of Ralcorp&#8217;s
      common stock.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>

      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">2</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: blue" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Consummation
      of the transactions contemplated by the RMT Transaction Agreement will result
      in
      the Company&#8217;s shareholders holding approximately 54% of Ralcorp&#8217;s common stock
      and existing Ralcorp shareholders holding approximately 46% of Ralcorp&#8217;s common
      stock immediately after the Merger, in each case on a fully diluted
      basis.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Immediately
      following the Merger, Merger Sub will merge with and into Ralcorp in a &#8220;short
      form&#8221; merger.&#160;&#160;Upon consummation of the short form merger, the RMT
      Debt and the Splitco Securities will become debt obligations of
      Ralcorp.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">Consummation
      of the transactions contemplated by the RMT Transaction Agreement is subject
      to
      customary joint closing conditions, including the absence of legal impediments
      to the consummation of the transactions, the receipt of governmental approvals
      with respect to or the expiration or termination of any required waiting periods
      under the Hart-Scott-Rodino Antitrust Improvements Act of 1976 and the
      Competition Act (Canada), the effectiveness of certain filings with the
      Securities and Exchange Commission and&#160;approval by Ralcorp&#8217;s shareholders
      of the issuance of Ralcorp common stock in the Merger.&#160; In addition, it is
      a condition to the Company<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">&#8217;</font>s obligations
      that
      the Company receive&#160;tax opinions and a favorable ruling from the Internal
      Revenue Service with respect to certain aspects of the
      transactions.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">The
      foregoing description of the RMT Transaction Agreement and the transactions
      contemplated thereby does not purport to be complete and is qualified in its
      entirety by the terms and conditions of the RMT Transaction Agreement, which
      is
      filed as Exhibit&#160;2.1 hereto, and incorporated into this report by
      reference.&#160;&#160;All stockholders of the Company are urged to read the RMT
      Transaction Agreement carefully and in its entirety.&#160;&#160;The RMT
      Transaction Agreement&#160;has been included to provide you with information
      regarding its terms. &#160;It is not intended to provide any other factual
      information about the Company.&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">The
      RMT
      Transaction Agreement contains representations and warranties that the Company,
      on the one hand, and Ralcorp and Merger Sub, on the other hand, have made to
      each other as of specific dates.&#160;&#160;The assertions embodied in those
      representations and warranties were made solely for purposes of the contract
      between the parties to the RMT Transaction Agreement and may be subject to
      important qualifications and limitations agreed to by the parties in connection
      with negotiating the terms of the contract.&#160;&#160;Moreover, some of those
      representations and warranties may not be accurate or complete as of any
      specified date, may be subject to a contractual standard of materiality
      different from those generally applicable to shareholders, or may have been
      used
      for the purpose of allocating risk between the parties rather than establishing
      matters as facts.&#160;&#160;For the foregoing reasons,&#160;investors should
      not rely on the representations and warranties as statements of factual
      information.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">*
      * * *
      *</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><u>Forward-Looking
      Statements</u></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">This
      report contains forward-looking statements.&#160;&#160;Any statements that
      express, or involve discussions as to expectations, beliefs, plans, objectives,
      assumptions or future events or performance (often, but not always, through
      the
      use of words or phrases such as &#8220;will likely result&#8221;, &#8220;are expected to&#8221;, &#8220;will
      continue&#8221;, &#8220;is anticipated&#8221;, &#8220;believe&#8221;, &#8220;could&#8221;, &#8220;estimated&#8221;, &#8220;may&#8221;, &#8220;plan&#8221;,
&#8220;potential&#8221;, &#8220;projection&#8221;, &#8220;target&#8221; and &#8220;outlook&#8221;) are not statements of
      historical facts and may be forward-looking.&#160;These forward-looking
      statements involve risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results
      to
      differ materially from those predicted in the forward-looking statements. Such
      factors, include, but are not limited to, pricing actions, delays in
      consummating the transaction, failure to obtain Ralcorp shareholder approval,
      regulatory actions or delays related to the particular brands included in the
      transaction, receipt of an IRS ruling approving the tax-free status of the
      transaction, failure to recognize expected cost savings from our restructuring
      program and increased competition.&#160;&#160;For additional information on
      these and other factors that could affect our forward-looking statements, see
      our filings with the SEC, including our most recently filed Annual Report on
      Form 10-K and subsequent reports on Form 10-Q and 8-K. We disclaim and do not
      undertake any obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statements
      in
      this report.</font></div>

    <div><br>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><u>Additional
      Information</u></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">In
      connection with the proposed transaction between Ralcorp and the Company,
      Ralcorp will file a registration statement on Form S-4 with the SEC. &#160;Such
      registration statement will include a proxy statement of Ralcorp that also
      constitutes a prospectus of Ralcorp, and will be sent to the shareholders of
      Ralcorp. &#160;Shareholders are urged to read the proxy statement/prospectus and
      any other relevant documents when they become available, because they will
      contain important information about the Company, Ralcorp and the proposed
      transaction. &#160;The proxy statement/prospectus and other documents relating
      to the proposed transaction (when they are available) can be obtained free
      of
      charge from the SEC&#8217;s website at www.sec.gov. &#160;These documents (when they
      are available) can also be obtained free of charge from the Company upon written
      request to Kraft Foods Inc., Three Lakes Drive, Northfield, Illinois 60093,
      or
      by calling (847) 646-5494, or from Ralcorp, upon written request to Ralcorp
      Holdings, Inc., 800 Market Street, Suite 2900, St. Louis, Missouri 63101, or
      by
      calling (314) 877-7113.</font></div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><u>Participants
      in the Proposed Transaction</u></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">This
      communication is not a solicitation of a proxy from any security holder of
      Ralcorp and shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an
      offer to buy securities, nor shall there be any sale&#160;of securities in any
      jurisdiction in which such solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to
      registration or qualification under the securities laws of such
      jurisdiction.&#160; However, the Company, Ralcorp and certain of their
      respective directors and executive officers may be deemed to be participants
      in
      the solicitation of proxies from shareholders in connection with the proposed
      transaction under the rules of the SEC. &#160;Information about the directors
      and executive officers of the Company may be found in its 2006 Annual Report
      on
      Form 10-K filed with the SEC on March 1, 2007, definitive proxy statement
      relating to its 2007 Annual Meeting of Shareholders filed with the SEC on March
      13, 2007 and current report on Form 8-K filed with the SEC on November 7, 2007.
      &#160;Information about the directors and executive officers of Ralcorp may be
      found in its 2006 Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC on December
      13,
      2006, definitive proxy statement relating to its 2006 Annual Meeting of
      Shareholders filed with the SEC on December 13, 2006 and current report on
      Form
      8-K filed with the SEC on October 2, 2007. &#160;These documents can be obtained
      free of charge from the sources indicated above. Additional information
      regarding the interests of these participants will also be included in the
      proxy
      statement/prospectus regarding the proposed transaction when it becomes
      available.</font></div>

      INDEX</font></div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="90%">

          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="7%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><strong>Exhibit</strong></font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="89%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><strong>Description</strong></font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="7%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">2.1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">RMT
                Transaction Agreement, among Kraft Foods Inc., Cable Holdco, Inc.,
                Ralcorp
                Holdings, Inc. and Ralcorp Mailman LLC., dated as of November 15,
                2007.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

            </tr>

              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="86%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><a href="#8_4">Intellectual
                  Property</a></font></div>
              </td>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">53</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>

                  Information</a></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="top" width="7%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">79</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="7%">

              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="86%">

                  Non-Solicitation</a></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="top" width="7%">

              </td>
            </tr>

              </td>

              </td>
              <td align="left" valign="top" width="86%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;"><a href="#15_3">Indemnification
                  by Splitco and RMT
                  Partner</a></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="top" width="7%">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman;">111</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>This
      RMT TRANSACTION AGREEMENT (this
&#8220;<strong>Agreement</strong>&#8221;), dated as of November&#160;15, 2007, is by and
      between Kraft Foods Inc., a Virginia corporation (&#8220;<strong>Parent</strong>&#8221;),
      Cable Holdco, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#8220;<strong>Splitco</strong>&#8221;), Ralcorp
      Holdings, Inc., a Missouri corporation (&#8220;<strong>RMT Partner</strong>&#8221;) and
      Ralcorp Mailman LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#8220;<strong>Merger
      Sub</strong>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><u>W
      I T
      N E S S E T H:</u></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      KFG is a direct, wholly owned
      subsidiary of Parent;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      KFG and certain non-U.S.
      subsidiaries of KFG conduct the Business (capitalized and other terms are as
      defined in Article&#160;I hereof);</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      prior to the date of this
      Agreement, Splitco has been incorporated and Newco has been formed under the
      laws of the State of Delaware as direct, wholly owned subsidiaries of KFG,
      Merger Sub has been formed under the laws of the State of Delaware as a direct,
      wholly owned subsidiary of RMT Partner and RMT Partner Canada has been formed
      under the laws of British Columbia as an indirect, wholly owned subsidiary
      of
      RMT Partner;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      on the terms and subject to
      the conditions set forth herein, the parties intend to effect the actions set
      forth below:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(A)
      at the
      time of, or prior to, the RMT Debt Incurrence, pursuant to the Newco
      Contribution, KFG shall transfer, or cause to be transferred, the U.S. Acquired
      Assets (excluding the Modesto Facility) and cash as set forth herein to Newco
      in
      exchange for the assumption by Newco of the U.S. Assumed Liabilities (other
      than
      the RMT Debt) and, pursuant to the Modesto Purchase, Parent shall cause the
      Modesto Facility to be transferred to Newco in exchange for a cash payment
      and
      certain other consideration;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(B)
      immediately prior to the Splitco Contribution, KFG shall incur the RMT Debt
      and
      receive the RMT Debt Proceeds pursuant to the RMT Debt Incurrence;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(C)
      following
      the RMT Debt Incurrence, pursuant to the Splitco Contribution, Parent will
      cause
      KFG to contribute the limited liability company interests in Newco to Splitco
      in
      exchange for (i) the issuance by Splitco to KFG of the Splitco Securities,
      (ii)&#160;the issuance by Splitco to KFG of a number of shares of Splitco Common
      Stock calculated as set forth herein pursuant to the Splitco Share Issuance
      and
      (iii) the assumption by Splitco of the RMT Debt;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(D</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">)
      immediately following the Splitco Contribution, the Splitco Share Issuance
      and
      the issuance of Splitco Securities, and prior to the Distribution, KFG shall
      distribute all the issued and outstanding shares of Splitco Common Stock held
      by
      KFG to Parent pursuant to the Internal Spin;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><a href="#toc">Table
            of Contents</a></font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(E)
      immediately following the Internal Spin, KFG shall consummate the Internal
      Debt
      Repayment by transferring the RMT Debt Proceeds to Parent in exchange for the
      retirement of outstanding intercompany debt;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(F)
      immediately following the Internal Debt Repayment, KFG may consummate the
      Internal Debt Exchange by transferring the Splitco Securities to Parent in
      exchange for the retirement of outstanding intercompany debt;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(G)
      following
      the Internal Spin and the Internal Debt Repayment and the Internal Debt
      Exchange, if applicable, and on the Distribution Date, Parent shall consummate
      the Distribution of the Splitco Common Stock to Eligible Parent
      Stockholders;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(H)
      immediately following the Distribution, pursuant to the Splitco Merger, Splitco
      shall merge with and into Merger Sub, whereby each issued share of Splitco
      Common Stock shall be converted into the right to receive one fully paid and
      nonassessable share of RMT Partner Common Stock;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(I)
      immediately following the Splitco Merger, pursuant to the Short Form Merger,
      the
      Splitco Merger Surviving Company shall merge with and into RMT
      Partner;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(J)
      immediately following the Short Form Merger, pursuant to the Non-U.S. Transfer,
      Parent shall cause the Non-U.S. Transferors to sell and transfer the Non-U.S.
      Acquired Assets to the Non-U.S. Transferees, in exchange for the irrevocable
      assumption by the Non-U.S. Transferees of the Non-U.S. Assumed Liabilities
      and
      certain other consideration; and</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;(K)
      on or
      following the Distribution Date, Parent may cause the External Debt Exchange
      to
      be effected;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      the respective Boards of
      Directors of RMT Partner, Merger Sub, Parent and Splitco have approved this
      Agreement, the Collateral Agreements and the transactions contemplated hereby
      and thereby; and as soon as practicable after the date of this Agreement, RMT
      Partner, as the sole member of Merger Sub, shall approve this Agreement and
      Parent, as the sole stockholder of Splitco, shall adopt this
      Agreement;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      the issuance of shares of RMT
      Partner in the Splitco Merger shall be submitted to the stockholders of RMT
      Partner for approval; and</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>WHEREAS,
      the parties intend the
      Proposed Transactions to qualify for the Intended Tax-Free
      Treatment.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt;"></font>NOW,
      THEREFORE, in consideration of the
      representations and warranties and covenants and agreements contained herein
      and
      for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which
      are hereby acknowledged, the parties, intending to be legally bound, hereby
      agree as follows:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><a href="#toc">Table

    </div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><strong><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><a name="article_1">ARTICLE
      1</a></font><br></strong></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><u><strong>DEFINITIONS</strong></u></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<a name="1_1">1.1</a><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;
<u>Certain
      Definitions</u>.&#160;&#160;For all purposes of this Agreement, except as
      expressly provided or unless the context otherwise requires, the following
      definitions shall apply:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Accounting Firm</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;4.10(c).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;</font></font></font>&#8220;<strong>Acquired
      Assets</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;4.2.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;"><font style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Acquired Intellectual Property</strong>&#8221; shall mean all Intellectual
      Property used by Parent and its subsidiaries exclusively in connection with
      the
      Business, including (i) all Assigned Marks, Assigned Patents, Assigned
      Copyrights, Assigned Domain Names, and Assigned Trade Secrets (as such terms
      are
      defined in the Omnibus Acquired Intellectual Property Assignments), (ii) all
      other Intellectual Property assigned and/or required to be assigned pursuant
      to
      the Omnibus Acquired Intellectual Property Assignments, (iii) all formulas
      used
      to create Products sold under the Assigned Marks, (iv) the identification of
      all
      ingredients in Products and all other information (to the extent owned by Parent
      or its subsidiaries) related to such Products and used exclusively in connection
      with the Business that is listed on the informational panel of the packaging
      for
      such Products (and any prior versions or variations thereof), (v) all recipes
      that include one or more Products as a primary ingredient (relative to other
      Parent-branded ingredients) (provided, however, that to the extent that such
      recipes include reference to other branded products of Parent, generic or
      non-branded ingredients shall be substituted for the branded ingredients),
      (vi)
      without representing or warranting the scope or extent of any rights of Parent
      or its subsidiaries, whatever rights Parent or its affiliates or subsidiaries
      own in all characters, commercials, advertisements, marketing and games that
      have been used exclusively in connection with the Business or otherwise
      exclusively used or developed on or in connection with any Products sold under
      the Assigned Marks and (vii) all content of any websites and/or web pages
      embedded within any website owned by Parent or its subsidiaries and which
      content is used exclusively in connection with the Business.&#160;&#160;All
      Parent Scheduled Trademarks, all pending trademark applications and non-U.S.
      and
      non-Canadian trademark registrations set forth in <u>Schedules&#160;8.4(b)</u>
      and <u>8.4(b)(iv)</u>, all Parent Scheduled Copyrights, all Parent Scheduled
      Domain Names, and all Parent Scheduled Patents are and shall be Acquired
      Intellectual Property, even if any such asset is not used exclusively in
      connection with the Business, so long as such asset is used primarily in
      connection with the Business (subject to the provisions of the following
      sentence) and such asset is not used primarily on or in connection with any
      other business or product of Parent.&#160;&#160;Acquired Intellectual Property
      shall include, regardless of the extent to which such asset is used in
      connection with the Business, (x) all right, title and interest in, to and
      under
      all formulas, know-how, and technology (including Parent Scheduled Patents)
      used
      to create or manufacture Products and (y) all Assigned Key Marks.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Adjustment Payment</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;4.10(e).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Adjustment Statements</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto
      in Section&#160;4.10(a).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;">-
            3
            -</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: blue" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><a href="#toc">Table
            of Contents</a></font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>affiliate</strong>&#8221; of any Person shall mean another Person that
      directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, controls, is
      controlled by, or is under common control with, such first Person. As used
      herein, &#8220;<strong>control</strong>&#8221; shall mean the possession, directly or
      indirectly, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management
      and
      policies of such entity, whether through ownership of voting securities or
      other
      interests, by contract or otherwise.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Agreement</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in the
      preamble.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8220;<strong>ALPHA-BITS
      Phase-Out License Agreement</strong>&#8221; shall mean the ALPHA-BITS Phase-Out
      License Agreement substantially in the form attached hereto as <u>Exhibit
      A</u>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Annual Financial Information</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned
      thereto in Section&#160;8.9(b).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Assigned Contracts</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;4.2(f).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Assigned Key Marks</strong>&#8221; shall mean the marks listed on <u>Schedule
      1.1(a)</u>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Assumed Benefit Plan</strong>&#8221; shall mean each Parent Benefit Plan or
      portion thereof (i)&#160;that the parties to this Agreement have explicitly
      agreed shall be assumed by RMT Partner, Splitco or any of their respective
      affiliates pursuant to this Agreement, (ii)&#160;that RMT Partner, Splitco or
      any of their respective affiliates is required to assume under applicable law
      or
      any applicable CBA or (iii)&#160;that RMT Partner, Splitco or any of their
      respective affiliates is required to replicate pursuant to any applicable
      CBA.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Assumed Liabilities</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto
      in Section&#160;4.4.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Benefits Continuation Period</strong>&#8221; shall mean the two-year period
      following the Distribution Date.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Business</strong>&#8221; shall mean the business of Parent and its
      subsidiaries relating to the production, distribution, manufacture, marketing,
      packaging and sale of the Products.&#160;&#160;It is understood and agreed that
      the term &#8220;Business&#8221; shall not include the business conducted by the joint
      venture described in <u>Schedule&#160;4.3(n)</u>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Business Employees</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;11.3(a).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Business Inventory</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;4.2(a).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Business Material Adverse Effect</strong>&#8221; shall mean any circumstance,
      change, effect, development, condition, occurrence or event that, individually
      or when taken together with all other such circumstances, changes, effects,
      developments, conditions, occurrences or events, is materially adverse to,
      or
      has a material adverse effect on, the business, financial condition, assets
      or
      results of operations of the Business; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that
&#8220;Business Material Adverse Effect&#8221; shall not include the effect of any
      circumstance, change, effect, development, condition, occurrence or event
      (i)&#160;arising out of or affecting the industry in which the Business operates
      generally, (ii)&#160;arising out of or affecting the general economy or
      financial markets, (iii)&#160;arising out of the announcement of this Agreement
      and the Collateral Agreements and the transactions contemplated hereby and
      thereby, (iv)&#160;arising out of changes in law, (v)&#160;arising out of acts
      of war or terrorism, (vi)&#160;arising out of any action taken or not taken by
      Parent or its affiliates with the written consent or agreement of, or at the
      direction of, RMT Partner or (vii)&#160;arising out of the matters set forth on
<u>Schedule&#160;8.16</u>, except, in the cases of clauses (i), (ii), (iv) and
      (v) above, to the extent that the Business is materially disproportionately
      affected as compared to other participants in the same industry.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div><br></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Business Material Contracts</strong>&#8221;<strong>&#160;</strong>shall have
      the meaning assigned thereto in Section&#160;8.6.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Assets</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;5.9(b).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Competition Act</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned
      thereto in Section&#160;8.1(c).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Liabilities</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto
      in Section&#160;5.9(b).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Parent Hourly Pension Plan&#8221; </strong>shall mean the Kraft
      Canada Inc. Retirement Plan for Niagara Falls Hourly Cereal Division
      Employees.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><strong><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </strong>&#8220;<strong>Canadian Parent Salaried Pension Plan&#8221; </strong>shall mean the
      Kraft Canada Inc. Retirement Plan for Canadian Salaried Employees or the Kraft
      Canada Inc. Retirement Plan for Niagara Falls Salaried Cereal Division
      Employees, as applicable.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Non-Represented Employee</strong>&#8221; shall mean each
      Non-Represented Employee who, immediately prior to the relevant Transfer Time,
      is employed primarily in Canada.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Represented Employee</strong>&#8221; shall mean each Represented
      Employee who, immediately prior to the relevant Transfer Time, is employed
      primarily in Canada.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Canadian Non-U.S. Transfer</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned
      thereto in Section&#160;5.9(b).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Capitalization Date</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto
      in Section&#160;9.2(a).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Cause</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;11.3(d).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>CBAs</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;5.10(b).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Closing</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;2.18.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Closing Adjustment Statement</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned
      thereto in Section&#160;4.10(a).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Closing Date</strong>&#8221; shall have the meaning assigned thereto in
      Section&#160;2.18.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      &#8220;<strong>Code</strong>&#8221; shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as
      amended.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
